A data transfer object (DTO) that represents a tag filter option with its associated device count, designed for REST API responses in device filtering operations.

## Key Components

- **value** - The internal tag value used for filtering
- **label** - Human-readable display name for the tag
- **count** - Number of devices associated with this tag

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating a tag filter item
TagFilterItem filterItem = TagFilterItem.builder()
    .value("production")
    .label("Production Environment")
    .count(25)
    .build();

// Using in a filter response
List<TagFilterItem> availableFilters = Arrays.asList(
    TagFilterItem.builder()
        .value("staging")
        .label("Staging")
        .count(8)
        .build(),
    TagFilterItem.builder()
        .value("development")
        .label("Development")
        .count(12)
        .build()
);

// Accessing properties
String tagValue = filterItem.getValue();     // "production"
String displayName = filterItem.getLabel(); // "Production Environment"
Integer deviceCount = filterItem.getCount(); // 25
```

The class uses Lombok annotations for automatic generation of getters, setters, constructors, and builder pattern. OpenAPI/Swagger annotations provide API documentation with example values for each field.
